00102             function                __construct()
00103             {
00104                   try
00105                   {
00106                         $this->Cache = @file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/cache' );
00107                         $this->TableOfContents = @file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/table' );
00108                         if( $this->TableOfContents !== false )
00109                         {
00110                               $this->TableOfContents = unserialize( $this->TableOfContents );
00111                         }
00112                         
00113                         $this->reset();
00114                   }
00115                   catch( Exception $e )
00116                   {
00117                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00118                   }
00119             }

00135             function                reset()
00136             {
00137                   try
00138                   {
00139                         $Conf = file_get_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/conf/cf_cache' );
00140                         $Conf = explode( ';' , $Conf );
00141                         $Conf[ 0 ] = explode( '=' , $Conf[ 0 ] );
00142                         $Conf[ 1 ] = explode( '=' , $Conf[ 1 ] );
00143                         $this->CacheSwitch = $Conf[ 0 ][ 1 ] == 'on';
00144                         $this->CacheTimeout = intval( $Conf[ 1 ][ 1 ] );
00145                   }
00146                   catch( Exception $e )
00147                   {
00148                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00149                   }
00150             }

00174             function                get_data( $SectionOriginName )
00175             {
00176                   try
00177                   {
00178                         if(  $this->TableOfContents === false )
00179                         {
00180                               return( false );
00181                         }
00182                         $md5SectionOriginName = md5( $SectionOriginName );
00183                         if( isset( $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ] ) )
00184                         {
00185                               $CreateDate = $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'tags' ][ '_timeout' ];
00186                               if( time() - $CreateDate > $this->CacheTimeout )
00187                               {
00190                                     $this->delete_data( $SectionOriginName );
00191                                     return( false );
00192                               }
00193                               $HeaderSize = 32 + 1 + 32 + 1;
00194                               $ReadCursor = $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'read_cursor' ];
00195                               $SectionSize = $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'section_size' ];
00196                               return( substr( $this->Cache , $ReadCursor + $HeaderSize , $SectionSize - $HeaderSize ) );
00197                         }
00198                         else
00199                         {
00200                               return( false );
00201                         }
00202                   }
00203                   catch( Exception $e )
00204                   {
00205                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00206                   }
00207             }
00208             
00231             function                set_data( $SectionOriginName , $Data )
00232             {
00233                   try
00234                   {
00235                         if(  $this->TableOfContents === false )
00236                         {
00237                               throw( new Exception( 'Cache is empty' ) );
00238                         }
00239                         $md5SectionOriginName = md5( $SectionOriginName );
00240                         if( isset( $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ] ) )
00241                         {
00242                               $HeaderSize = 32 + 1 + 32 + 1;
00243                               $ReadCursor = $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'read_cursor' ];
00244                               $SectionSize = $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'section_size' ];
00245                               $NewDataSize = strlen( $Data );
00246                               $this->Cache = substr_replace( 
00247                                     $this->Cache , 
00248                                     $md5SectionOriginName.':'.sprintf( "%032d" , $NewDataSize + $HeaderSize ).':'.$Data , 
00249                                     $ReadCursor , 
00250                                     $SectionSize
00251                               );
00252                               
00255                               $NewTable = array();
00256                               foreach( $this->TableOfContents as $Key => $Value )
00257                               {
00258                                     if( $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] === $ReadCursor )
00259                                     {
00262                                           $Value[ 'section_size' ] = $HeaderSize + $NewDataSize;
00263                                     }
00264                                     if( $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] > $ReadCursor )
00265                                     {
00266                                           $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] += $HeaderSize + $NewDataSize - $SectionSize;
00267                                     }
00268                                     $Value[ 'tags' ][ '_timeout' ] = time();
00269                                     $NewTable[ $Key ] = $Value;
00270                               }
00271                               $this->TableOfContents = $NewTable;
00272                               
00273                               if( $this->CacheSwitch === true )
00274                               {
00275                                     $this->CacheWasUpdated = true;
00276                               }
00277                         }
00278                         else
00279                         {
00280                               throw( new Exception( 'Section '.$SectionOriginName.' was not found' ) );
00281                         }
00282                   }
00283                   catch( Exception $e )
00284                   {
00285                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00286                   }
00287             }

00319             function                add_data( $SectionOriginName , $Data , $Tags = array() )
00320             {
00321                   try
00322                   {
00323                         $this->delete_data( $SectionOriginName );
00324                         $md5SectionOriginName = md5( $SectionOriginName );
00325                         $SectionSize = 32 + 1 + 32 + 1 + strlen( $Data );
00326                         $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ] = array( 
00327                               'section_size' => $SectionSize , 'read_cursor' => strlen( $this->Cache )
00328                         );
00329                         $this->Cache .= $md5SectionOriginName.":".sprintf( "%032d" , $SectionSize ).":$Data";
00330                         $this->TableOfContents[ $md5SectionOriginName ][ 'tags' ] = array_merge( 
00331                               $Tags , array( '_cache_sys' , '_timeout' => time() )
00332                         );
00333                         
00334                         if( $this->CacheSwitch === true )
00335                         {
00336                               $this->CacheWasUpdated = true;
00337                         }
00338                   }
00339                   catch( Exception $e )
00340                   {
00341                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00342                   }
00343             }

00363             function                delete_data( $SectionOriginName )
00364             {
00365                   try
00366                   {
00367                         if( $this->CacheSwitch === false )
00368                         {
00369                               return;
00370                         }
00371                         $this->delete_section( md5( $SectionOriginName ) );
00372                   }
00373                   catch( Exception $e )
00374                   {
00375                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00376                   }
00377             }

00404             function                data_exists( $SectionOriginName )
00405             {
00406                   try

00408                         if( $this->TableOfContents === false )

00410                               return( false );
00411                         }

00415                         }

00449             private function  compile_new_table_of_contents( $ReadCursor , $SectionSize )
00450             {
00451                   try
00452                   {
00453                         $NewTable = array();
00454                         
00455                         foreach( $this->TableOfContents as $Key => $Value )
00456                         {
00457                               if( $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] === $ReadCursor )
00458                               {
00459                                     /* nop */
00460                               }
00461                               else
00462                               {
00463                                     if( $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] > $ReadCursor )
00464                                     {
00465                                           $Value[ 'read_cursor' ] -= $SectionSize;
00466                                     }
00467                                     $NewTable[ $Key ] = $Value;
00468                               }
00469                         }
00470                         
00471                         return( $NewTable );
00472                   }
00473                   catch( Exception $e )
00474                   {
00475                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00476                   }
00477             }
00478             
00497             private function  delete_section( $SectionName )
00498             {
00499                   try
00500                   {
00501                         if( $this->TableOfContents !== false && isset( $this->TableOfContents[ $SectionName ] ) )
00502                         {
00503                               $ReadCursor = $this->TableOfContents[ $SectionName ][ 'read_cursor' ];
00504                               $SectionSize = $this->TableOfContents[ $SectionName ][ 'section_size' ];
00505                               $this->Cache = substr_replace( $this->Cache , '' , $ReadCursor , $SectionSize );
00506                               
00511                               $this->TableOfContents = $this->compile_new_table_of_contents( $ReadCursor , $SectionSize );
00512                               
00513                               $this->CacheWasUpdated = true;
00514                         }
00515                   }
00516                   catch( Exception $e )
00517                   {
00518                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00519                   }
00520             }

00540             function                delete_data_by_tag( $Tag )
00541             {
00542                   try
00543                   {
00544                         if( $this->CacheSwitch === false )
00545                         {
00546                               return;
00547                         }
00548                         $Sections = array();
00549                         
00550                         foreach( $this->TableOfContents as $Key => $Value )
00551                         {
00552                               if( array_search( $Tag , $Value[ 'tags' ] ) !== false )
00553                               {
00554                                     $Sections [] = $Key;
00555                               }
00556                         }
00557                         
00558                         foreach( $Sections as $Key => $Value )
00559                         {
00560                               $this->delete_section( $Value );
00561                         }
00562                   }
00563                   catch( Exception $e )
00564                   {
00565                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00566                   }
00567             }

00583             function                flush()
00584             {
00585                   try
00586                   {
00587                         if( $this->CacheWasUpdated && $this->CacheSwitch === true )
00588                         {
00589                               @unlink( dirname( __FILE__ ).'./data/cache' );
00592                               file_put_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/cache' , $this->Cache );
00593                               
00596                               file_put_contents( dirname( __FILE__ ).'/data/table' , serialize( $this->TableOfContents ) );
00597                         }
00598                   }
00599                   catch( Exception $e )
00600                   {
00601                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00602                   }
00603             }
00604             
00619             function                drop_cache()
00620             {
00621                   try
00622                   {
00623                         @unlink( dirname( __FILE__ ).'./data/cache' );
00624                         @unlink( dirname( __FILE__ ).'./data/table' );

00646             function                __destruct()
00647             {
00648                   try
00649                   {
00650                         if( $this->CacheSwitch === false )
00651                         {
00652                               return;
00653                         }
00654                         
00655                         $this->flush();
00656                   }
00657                   catch( Exception $e )
00658                   {
00659                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
